name: 3D Blast: In The Groove
description:
MUSIC BY 3D BLAST

GAME DEVELOPMENT BY ISEEICY HAWKSTON

On a day just like any other, you discover that the one and only 3D Blast is going on tour across the universe. Normally you would be beyond excited, if it wasn't for just one thing: the concert is today. Pack your things, and haul yourself as quick as possible through 4 different levels to 3D Blast's venue.

-| CONTROLS |-

Move - Mouse

W - Jump

S - Crouch

A - Punch Left

D - Punch Right

-| SONG LIST |-

  1. H3ART feat. おかげ Magician
  2. Tōkyōdaigaku (We'll Make It Together)
  3. Diet Disco
  4. POWER TRIP (The Dream Will Last Forever) feat. Sam Quick

-| STREAMS & VIDEOS |-

  • 3D BLAST - Good To Be Back with Twilight Princess HD (Around 4:57:00)
  • Futabot - EP 7: #MusicGameJam: The Legend Continues (Around 1:16:00)
  • ElysiaGriffin - 🔴 Music Game Jam! | !Subtember | www.twitter.com/elysiagriffin (Around 3:34:00)
  • NanoDill - MGJ Day 2! Playing all the entries from the Music Game Jam until 10 PM BST! (Around 0:12:45)
  • XavierEkkel - Music Game Jam Day 1 (Around 1:22:00)
  • MikeMountain - Top 5 Music Game Jam Games! | Music Game Jam Game Gameplay Games Oh Boy

-| CHANGELOG |-

0.2

  • Added a skipping mechanism to cut-scenes
  • Re-wrote part of cassette syncing script, making gameplay much tighter
  • Added a basic level select
  • Made end credit screen interactable

0.1

  • Released Game!
